title: Happy Birthday, You-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Happy birthday, You! This number one school idol in the universe, Nico, has come to celebrate your birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oh, thanks.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>So nonchalant!? Even though Nico came here to celebrate with you! That reaction is putting it way too lightly, you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Waaah! I’m so thrilled that you’re here to celebrate my birthday, Nico-san~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That acting is too dramatic and creepy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Isn’t creepy a bit too harsh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, it’s fine. Before we go to the others, there’s something I’d like to say. I think you’re amazing, You. Being able to get someone fired up while just being yourself is your biggest asset. Make sure you own it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeeh!? What’s gotten into you all of a sudden, Nico-san!? Well, I know it’s a compliment, but.... From my perspective, I think it’s more impressive to be able to think things through and be a perfect school idol.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You....! So you do understand! Nico is amazing! But as someone that Nico approves of, you’re not so bad yourself. Be aware of that and work hard from now on!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm~, I guess it’s nice to hear something like that on your birthday. Got it! I’ll keep at it like I always do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
